backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining all data types (healthcare professionals, hospitals, vendors, NGOs, medical records, research projects, health records, medical tourism) and including authorization and blob storage mixins for access control and file management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three features related to removing multicolor gradient text styling from text overlaying images/videos on Home.tsx, HealthcareSupportSystem.tsx, and ensuring gradients only appear on solid backgrounds across AboutUs.tsx, NetworkMap.tsx, and Onboarding.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files describing routing, pages, components, hooks, and styling, with emphasis on gradient text usage, stakeholder registration flows, admin approval workflows, and network map visualization.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light/dark themes and McKinsey-inspired design tokens for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the AI Health Zon application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes (onboarding, home, about, solutions, healthcare support, directory, network map, careers, vendors, ambulance, NGOs, dashboard, admin, contact, legal pages) wrapped in Layout component.
frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx: AI chatbot component with expandable floating interface, message history, auto-scroll, typing indicator, and contextual responses about healthcare services, contact info, RCM, technology, network directory, careers, vendors, ambulances, and NGOs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying brand info, social media links, navigation columns (Quick Links, Services, Legal), and copyright notice. Uses Lucide and react-icons for icons and TanStack Router for navigation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps the app with Navigation header, main content area (Outlet), and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky header navigation with responsive mobile menu, dynamic nav links based on auth/admin status, Internet Identity login/logout, and admin badge showing pending request count.
frontend/src/components/PendingRequestsL: Displays a list of pending requests (professional, vendor, ambulance, or NGO) using RequestDetailCard components, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component for new users to create their profile by selecting account type (hospital, professional, vendor, NGO) and entering their name.
frontend/src/components/RequestDetailCar: Expandable card displaying detailed request information with approve/reject actions, contact buttons (WhatsApp, email), and type-specific data fields for professional, vendor, ambulance, or NGO requests.
frontend/src/components/StakeholderDetai: Modal dialog showing detailed view of a stakeholder (Hospital, Vendor, or NGO) with contact info, services/specializations, and action buttons for communication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating healthcare data including user profiles, hospitals, professionals, vendors, NGOs, and registration requests with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with McKinsey-inspired professional color palette, Apple Intelligence gradient utilities, and custom typography/animation classes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About page displaying AI Health Zon's mission, vision, core values, services, and metrics with hero section and interactive cards using gradient styling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard for reviewing pending registration requests from healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, and ambulance services with access control and summary statistics.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceServices.tsx: Ambulance services registration and search page with form for submitting ambulance service details (name, location, contact, services) and a search interface to find ambulance services by city. Includes PIN code auto-lookup for city/state and integrates with backend mutations and queries.
frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx: Healthcare professional job application page with form for submitting registration requests including role selection, experience, location, and CV upload. Features PIN code auto-lookup and file upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying company contact information (address, phone, email, WhatsApp) and a contact form for user inquiries. Includes a chatbot component for additional support.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard page that displays different metrics and cards based on user type (hospital or professional), showing profile setup if needed or relevant statistics like revenue, claims, staff requests, and appointments.
frontend/src/pages/HealthcareSupportSyst: Marketing page showcasing 12 healthcare support categories (clinical excellence, infrastructure, training, etc.) with icons and video thumbnails, featuring a hero section and call-to-action to contact.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with a hero carousel showcasing healthcare services, value propositions with icons, and call-to-action buttons to explore the network directory.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx: Directory page that displays and filters hospitals, vendors, and NGOs with search, category, and location filters, plus a detail view modal for selected stakeholders.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkMap.tsx: Network visualization page showing statistics and a grid of locations where approved stakeholders are present, grouped by city and state.
frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx: NGO registration and listing page with a form for submitting new NGO registrations (with PIN code auto-lookup) and a filterable list of existing NGOs.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Animated onboarding flow that sequentially displays different healthcare stakeholder types (hospital, doctor, nurse, vendor, ambulance, NGO) before redirecting to home.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Static privacy policy page displaying information collection practices, data usage, sharing policies, security measures, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Displays the refund policy page with sections covering eligibility, request process, processing time, non-refundable items, and cancellations. Uses Card components to present policy information with dynamic last-updated date.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions.tsx: Presents healthcare solutions organized by verticals (RCM, Technology, Marketplace) with icons and feature lists using CheckCircle components. Displays comprehensive service offerings for revenue cycle management, technology integration, and healthcare marketplace connections.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditions.tsx: Renders the terms and conditions page covering acceptance of terms, service usage, user responsibilities, intellectual property, liability limitations, and modifications. Structured with Card components and dynamic last-updated date.
frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx: Vendor registration and listing page with a form for new vendor submissions and display of approved vendors. Includes PIN code auto-lookup for location, category selection, and uses React Query hooks for vendor data management and submission.
frontend/src/utils/pinCodeLookup.ts: Utility function that validates and looks up Indian PIN codes using the India Post API (postalpincode.in) to automatically retrieve city and state information. Returns structured result with success status and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Comprehensive URL parameter utilities supporting both standard query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for parameters. Includes functions for extracting, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL parameters with fallback mechanisms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including HSL-based color variables, Apple-inspired gradient backgrounds, custom font sizes with line heights, border radius variables, box shadows, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for AI Health Zon, a multi-stakeholder healthcare platform with RCM, technology solutions, and connecting platform features. Tracks 33 versions, known issues (chatbot and gradient text display), architectural notes about role-based auth, admin approval workflows, and PIN code-based auto-fill functionality.
